title: Progress Bar Offer
youtube: <iframe width='560' height='315' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/N9XPVBmHJTQ?si=V9_36sKA3VdUG-nF' title='YouTube video player' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
popupcontent:
• Access the App: Open your Shopify admin panel and navigate to 'Apps.' Click on 'Shopify Announcement Bar' to launch the app.
  • Create a New Announcement: Click on the 'Create Announcement' button to start setting up your announcement bar.
  • Customize Your Announcement:
    • Choose the type of announcement (e.g., discount, free shipping).
    • Enter the message you want to display.
    • Customize the appearance to match your store's branding.
  • Add a Countdown Timer: Enable the countdown timer feature and set the duration for your offer. Specify the start and end dates for the announcement.
  • Preview Your Announcement: Use the preview option to see how your announcement bar will look on your store.
  • Publish Your Announcement: Once you are satisfied with the setup, click the 'Publish button to make your announcement live on your store.
  • Monitor Performance: Use the app's analytics dashboard to track engagement and conversions from your announcement bar.
    • Note: Make sure to regularly update your announcements to keep your customers informed about the latest offers and promotions!

title: Usp Icons
popupcontent:
Browse our section library and find sections, add to any theme, edit from the theme editor.

Shopify themes usually comes with around 15 sections for you to design your store. If you don't like those sections or need something extra you are stuck with hard to learn page-builder apps, or expensive developers. Section Store is solving that issue with a section library full of plug-an-play customisable sections, that you can simply add to any theme on your store and customise in the theme editor. Think features, testimonials, faq, trust badges etc.

  • Browse and find sections. Add to any theme. Edit from Shopifys theme editor.
  • Upgrade your existing theme with new theme sections. No need to start over
  • Keep or even improve page-speed. Some apps loads slow, replace with a section.
  • Try section first. Experiment with sections before committing
  • New sections added every week - All sections 2.0 ready (Add to any page).
